com.wit.android.widget.adapter.internal

Class BaseWidgetAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.wit.android.widget.adapter.BaseWidgetAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseAdapter

    public abstract class BaseWidgetAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter

    Class Overview

    Updated android.widget.BaseAdapter for better handling and using the widget adapters.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    android.widget.BaseAdapter

        protected void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle outState)

        Parameters:

      • onRestoreInstanceState

        protected void onRestoreInstanceState(Bundle savedState)

        Invoked from the parent context which was restored with previous saved instance state to restore adapter state.

        Parameters:
        savedState - Bundle from parent context with saved data populated in onSaveInstanceState(Bundle). Always valid bundle.
